import React,{useState} from 'react' import {addvalue, deletevalue,deleteallvalue} from './actions/actions'; import {useDispatch} from 'react-redux'; import './App.css' const App = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const [inputdata, setinputdata] = useState('') return ( <>
{setinputdata(event.target.value)}} /> dispatch(addvalue(inputdata))} />

) } export default App
